client_description_Summary_Note:
Katharina Greta Klein and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Berlin. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Katharina Greta Klein is a 22 year old and comes from Germany.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced she to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Katharina Greta Klein is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background: Katharina finished secondary school at Otto-Hahn-Gymnasium Karlsruhe in 2021.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Katharina Greta Klein is a 22 year old and comes from Germany.
Katharina Greta Klein did not start her professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
She did not have any savings to invest in financial markets.
Client does not have any properties.She inherited 1030000 EUR from her grandfather, a well-known Neurosurgeon, in 2015, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is committed to helping Katharina achieve financial success and security as she embarks on her professional journey.
